achievements.conqueror_description: Make it through the asteroid field
achievements.live_once_description: loose no life in a complete run through the asteroid field
achievements.star_gazer_description: collect all stars in a complete run through the asteroid field
achievements.faster_than_light_description: complete all missions in 2 hours and 30 minutes or less

shop.energy_description: increase the energy of your shield generator
shop.luck_description: increase the chance that stars appear

mission.destroy_10_asteroids_once: destroy 10 asteroids in a single run
mission.destroy_50_asteroids_once: destroy 50 asteroids in a single run
mission.destroy_200_asteroids_row: destroy 200 asteroids in a row without getting hit
mission.collect_10_asteroids_total: get hit by an asteroid a total of 10 times
mission.collect_15_asteroids_total: get hit by an asteroid a total of 15 times
mission.collect_5_stars_once: collect 5 stars in a single run
mission.collect_20_stars_once: collect 20 stars in a single run
mission.collect_20_stars_row: collect 20 stars in a row without destroying one
mission.destroy_20_stars_once: destroy 20 stars in a single run
mission.destroy_20_stars_row: destroy 20 stars in a row without collecting one
mission.travel_3000_shields_on_total: travel a total of 3000 m with your shields on
mission.1_perfect_waves_once: collect every star & destroy every asteroid of a wave
mission.10_perfect_waves_total: collect every star & destroy every asteroid in a total of 10 waves
mission.5_perfect_waves_row: collect every star & destroy every asteroid of 5 waves in a row
mission.out_of_energy_20_total: empty your energy a total of 20 times
mission.out_of_energy_10_once: empty your energy 10 times in a single run
mission.out_of_energy_15_row: empty your energy 15 times in a row
mission.1500_without_shields_once: fly 1500 m without shields in a single run
mission.lose_2_lives_once: lose 2 lives in a single run
mission.lose_3_lives_once: lose 3 lives in a single run
mission.lose_4_lives_once: lose 4 lives in a single run
mission.5_waves_without_life_once: master 5 waves without losing a life in a single run
mission.20_waves_without_life_total: master a total of 20 waves without losing a life
mission.5_waves_without_life_row: master 5 waves in a row without losing a life
mission.travel_5000_without_out_of_energy_once: cover a distance of 5000 m without running out of energy
mission.travel_5000_without_getting_hit_once: cover a distance of 5000 m without getting hit
mission.travel_5000_without_collecting_star_once: cover a distance of 5000 m without collecting a star
mission.earn_500_points_once: earn 500 points in a single run

tutorial.collect_stuff: sammle Sterne um Punkte zu bekommen

achievements.star_gazer_description: Sammle alle Sterne bei einem flug durch das gesamte Asteroidenfeld
achievements.faster_than_light_description: Erledige alle Missionen in 2 Stunde und 30 Minuten oder weniger
